projects.title: Animo - World's First AI Actors Marketplace
projects.description: Fine-tuned machine learning models, automated dataset generation (2M+ synthetic annotated images), launched an end-to-end scaled platform with payments, notifications, alerts, queue, and model architecture, onboarded clients, and spearheaded a B2B SaaS revenue stream.

projects.title: Arzooo - B2B Electronics E-Commerce
projects.description: Led a team to develop and maintain React Native Android and iOS apps, streamlined launch processes, optimized CodePush, reduced crash rates, enhanced user experience, implemented end-to-end reporting and analytics monitoring, and implemented micro-frontend architecture.

projects.title: Whitehat Jr.
projects.description: Facilitated requirement gathering meetings, mentored team members, developed dynamic coach marks, and built a chatbot system.

projects.title: Perpule (Delvit Solutions Pvt. Ltd.)
projects.description: Led a team in the payments domain, architected and implemented POS (Point of Sale) software using Angular 6, integrated third-party payment systems, developed a Promotions engine, and migrated the dashboard from Angular 1.5x to Angular 7.

projects.title: Nowfloats Technologies
projects.description: Developed a responsive dashboard on Angular 6, integrated 50 social listings/channels with detailed analytics using custom filters, utilized D3 charts framework, and worked with RESTful APIs and integrated OAuth.

certifications_or_extras.education: B.Tech Engg. Physics, DELHI TECHNOLOGICAL UNIVERSITY, 2014 - 2018

questions.question: Explain your experience with Django and DRF, focusing on projects where you built RESTful APIs.
Describe a time when you had to optimize a slow database query in PostgreSQL. What steps did you take?
How do you ensure secure authentication and authorization in your APIs?
What is your experience with Celery and message queues? How have you used them in past projects?
Explain the difference between authentication and authorization.
Describe your experience with writing unit and integration tests in Python.
Given a list of integers, write a function to find the sum of all even numbers in the list.
How would you monitor and improve the performance of a Django application in a production environment?
